prizes.name: Most Popular—Attendees’ choice
prizes.description: The attendees’ choice award! Attendees, vote on your favorite project after the submission deadline!

prizes.name: HackThis Staff Choice
prizes.description: The staff choice award, voted on by our one and only HackThis staff!

prizes.name: Best Accessibility / Disability Project
prizes.description: An accessible education tool geared towards solving an educational problem for those with disabilities. Find the disability guidelines in our hacker guide or at this link - we will be judging accessibility projects based on this.

prizes.name: Best Tool for Students (Any Age)
prizes.description:
Best educational tool for students, designed by students!

The tool can be fixing any issue, from scheduling to video conferencing to mental health!

prizes.name: Best Tool for Educators
prizes.description:
An educational tool for educators, designed by students.

Your audience is educators, which includes issues like student engagement, or effective virtual classroom communication!

prizes.name: Best Data Visualization (Data Science)
prizes.description:
Using any dataset, present the best visualization of a current education related issue!

This cannot be the same project as submitted to the data science challenge.

prizes.name: Open Educational Category
prizes.description: Do you have a submission that is an education hack, but doesn’t fall under any of the other categories? Submit here!

prizes.name: Best Beginner Project
prizes.description: Any educational project created by self-identified beginners.
